features: Color Coding for Safer Food Prep - Each knife comes in its own vibrant color, which makes finding a specific knife in the set much quicker. The unique color-coded system also helps reduce the risk of cross-taste during food preparation. When cutting raw meat with one knife and fresh veggies with another, the knives’ bright colors will help prevent accidentally switching between the two knives.

Nonstick Color Coating - In addition to being eye-catching and easily recognizable, the knife set’s color coating also creates a nonstick cutting surface that helps prevent food from sticking to the blade. The result: faster and easier cutting, chopping, slicing, and dicing. Color Coding for Safer Food Prep.

Ergonomic Handles - Thoughtfully designed, the knives’ ergonomic handles promote a safe, secure grip for exceptional comfort and control during any food-prep cutting task. The ergonomic handles also help prevent hand fatigue during longer cutting sessions.

Matching Blade Guards - The GA Homefavor 10-piece colored knife set includes matching blade guards that slide securely into place, helping to keep the blades protected from unwanted scratches or dings when not in use. The blade guards also allow for safely and conveniently storing the knives in a kitchen drawer.

Quality gift box: Our kitchen knife set packed in a stylish colorful presentation box. Thoughtful design and an excellent gift idea for friends, family, and special occasions such as birthdays, weddings, anniversaries, and more.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: G.a HOMEFAVOR 10-piece Colored Knife Set with Blade Guards (5 Knives and 5 Knife Covers); Knives include: paring knife, utility knife, a carving knife, a chef’s knife, and bread knife. Durable stainless-steel blades effectively hold a sharp cutting edge for safe, efficient use. Unique color-coded system for quick knife identification and to reduce the risk of cross contact during food preparation. Nonstick color coating helps prevent food from sticking to the blade for faster, easier cutting. Ergonomic handles promote a secure, comfortable grip; Matching blade guards protect blades and allow for safe storage in a drawer.

10-Piece Colored Knife Set High-Quality Stainless-Steel Blades Novice and experienced chefs alike will appreciate this convenient 10-piece colored knife set. The professional-quality knives come in a range of stylish colors and feature durable stainless-steel blades that resist staining and effectively hold a sharp cutting edge for safe, efficient use. The set includes 5 knives with 5 matching blade-guard covers.

Nonstick Color Coating In addition to being eye-catching and easily recognizable, the knife set’s color coating also creates a nonstick cutting surface that helps prevent food from sticking to the blade. The result: faster and easier cutting, chopping, slicing, and dicing.

Ergonomic Handles Thoughtfully designed, the knives’ ergonomic handles promote a safe, secure grip for exceptional comfort and control during any food-prep cutting task. The ergonomic handles also help prevent hand fatigue during longer cutting sessions.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My new favorites
reviews.reviewText: I ordered a set for myself a few years ago. This year I ordered sets for my grown children. My original set is still as sharp and nice as the day they came.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Have held up well the past 6 months and still extremely sharp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 19, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Blade coating may not be that durable only time will tell but the blades themselves and the handles are very good. Well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wow, sharp knives!
reviews.reviewText: Sharp knives, different sizes, beautiful colors, safe casing. I stopped using my old knives since I got these ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Made cutting so easy &' fast. Other knives cut up my cutting board. Not these knifes I love it. I went to have a drink to celebrate lol. I don't like how the handle peels off. Sometimes it falls in my food while I am cutting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colorful knife set
reviews.reviewText: Sharp and a good value. I like the cover for each knife. It came in nice packaging as well, so would be great to wrap up as a gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Looks good but paint comes off
reviews.reviewText: I sharpened them and the red knife left a bunch of paint on the sharpener.It sorta says that it can come off in our food. Not sure what I will do with them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 19, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars best knives over ever owned
reviews.reviewText: so sharp, i love that they have covers, colors are also nice makes it super easy to grab the one i want
